product_name: Outside Inside Vintage Alpine Ski Ornament Set - Set of 4 - 2012/2013 Closeout
long_description: Incredible detail gives the 4 ornaments of the Outside Inside Vintage Alpine Ski Ornament Set a rustic, realistic appearance that will look great on your Christmas tree for years to come. Classic skiing designs are a great gift for the powderhounds in your life. Set of 4 ornaments includes old-school ski boot, cozy gondola, mug of hot cocoa and ''North Pole Express'' snowcat. Made of polystone resin with a braided cord to hang from the tree. Closeout.
short_description: Incredible detail gives the 4 ornaments of the Outside Inside Vintage Alpine Ski Ornament Set a rustic, realistic appearance that will look great on your Christmas tree for years to come.
